sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function About() { return (

Hi, I'm Joel.
I love to build all kinds of amazing apps.

This page is my statement to tell the world that I'm ready for whatever gets in my way. I've been using soft computer science skills for over a decade and have been growing on them ever since. Since I graduated from the university of Kansas, I've been felicitous for the programming world and keep learning new technologies and skills everyday. One thing I really pride myself is being life long student to my craft and I will use that information to be a future leader for others. If this sounds like I'm hitting all the right checkboxes, my contact form is right below. Thanks for visiting!

Work With Me See My Past Work
); }
